Articles.Content: As for SCANsat there was perfect an clear manual i can't find one for RPM. Maybe this great Mod isn't that much hard to use, but i like to know everything. Is there any manual for RPM ?
Yep. It's more like manual for Moders, not for users.

Yep. It's more like manual for Moders, not for users.

This is because unlike SCANSat, JSI RasterPropMonitor is primarily a toolkit for add-on authors to develop RPM displays for their own interiors.

There is no standard design/configuration for RPMs amongst all KSP add-ons, so there wouldn't be much point writing a definitive manual describing what each button/menu does.

That is putting in a very nice way lol, I was going to be a smart butt and ask if you had to have a manual to push a button I mean really just push it and see and push then more then once but like sumghai has said the more less just JSI mod do one thing but others that use a custom layout do other things.
